StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetSchoolAssignmentData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode int AS
SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID, RTRIM(HIGHSCHOOL_NAME) AS HIGH_SCHOOL_NAME, STREET, STREET2, CITY, STATE_CODE, ZIP_CODE, TELEPHONE_NUMBER, DOD_CODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), EFFECTIVE_DATE, 106) as EFFECTIVE_DATE, SCHOOL_TYPE FROM HIGH_SCHOOL WHERE SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode AND DELETED = 'N'
